title: Contact info for Jörg Hunziger
content:
Hello,

I am trying to track down any contact information for the type designer Jörg Hunziger, who worked with Adrian Frutiger in his paris studio (for some research for an exhibition). If anyone knows anything I will be more than happy.

Thank you!
author: Liron Turkenich

comments.content: Wrote you on Facebook (sorry, I usually never do that but I don’t have your email address I think).

> I don’t have your email address

You can use Typophile's own contact form: [http://typophile.com/user/226991/contact](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225616/http:/typophile.com/user/226991/contact "http://typophile.com/user/226991/contact")
